txt_1: The instructor's presentation is funny and not that boring.  He always point out some important detail and explain it.

txt_2: He was very engaging in lectures.  Made the course more fun, less boring.
txt_4: Boring by design, scheme is a stupid language for learning or general use.

txt_1: Very clear in lectures, used helpful analogies in lectures, helpful in office hours and very respectful of students.
txt_3: Course exams are easy if assignments are done.  Most of material understandable if studied.
txt_5: Affected positively due to small class.

txt_1: Explanations are vivid and useful.  More examples are needed.

txt_2: Details probably.  Actually, everything is great.

txt_1: Enthusiastic about the course.  Made class enjoyable.  Explained examples very well.
txt_2: Spend more time explaining new concepts, but overall no other comments.
txt_3: Interesting to see how programs actually worked, how much effort goes into them.
txt_4: Too much new information for a first time CS student.

txt_1: Explaining and to help everyone understand the material.
txt_2: Everything he does is excellent.  Stay the way you are!

txt_1: Dave Tompkins was an awesome prof.  Really good explanations & examples given in class.
Great presentation skills.  Keeps the class interested.  Lively and energetic.  Cares about the students' concerns.  Helpful during office hours.
txt_3: It was cool learning about how programs work.
txt_5: Dave kept it very positive, funny lively and enthusiastic.

txt_1: Explanation of course materials was well organized and understandable.  Good use of visuals & colourful markers.
txt_5: Focused students and Dave Tompkins has a good balance between work and fun in class.

txt_1: Explain the abstract content into concrete content.
Great visual presentations and very interactive class presentation.  Answers questions well.
txt_3: Great class presentations and easy to learn.
txt_4: Boring content.  However, instructor kept it interesting.
txt_5: Positive.  There were never any problems.
txt_6: Class size is small since old prof scared everyone away and no one comes anymore!  Dave has brought some back though :)
